mapper.select: select med_seq, user_id, med_box, NVL(med_name, '0') as med_name, NVL(med_hosp, '0') as med_hosp, NVL(med_way, '0') as med_way, NVL(med_times, '0') as med_times, med_date, NVL(med_alarm, '0') as med_alarm, med_update, NVL(med_memo, '0') as med_memo from t_medicine where user_id=#{user_id}

select med_seq, user_id, med_box, NVL(med_name, 0) med_name, NVL(med_hosp, 0) med_hosp, NVL(med_way, 0) med_way, NVL(med_times, 0) med_times, med_date, NVL(med_alarm, 0) med_alarm, med_update, NVL(med_memo, 0) med_memo from t_medicine where user_id=#{user_id} and med_box=#{med_box}
